name: EARLY CITY BULIDER_DEMO
description:
*PLAY ON YOUR MOBILE PHONE BY TURNING ON THE DESKTOP SITE, BY PRESSING THE DOTS ON THE UP-RIGHT CORNER.

                 

*PLAY ON FULL SCREEN TRY BUILDING A CITY BY COLLECTING DIFFERENT MATERIALS AND MEETING DIFFERENT CIVILIZATIONS. FOLLOW ME ON ITCH.IO *SUGGEST ME WHAT TO ADD IN FULL VERSION
